title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 application uses Class.forName() which is unnecessary.
EB: The BidiUtil class should have a private constructor because there are no non-static methods in this class. This will prevent people from instantiating the class unnecessarily.
SR: To fix this issue, add a private constructor to the BidiUtil class. This can be done by changing the line above to: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4);
